issue.title: [Release] Improvements to Windows release verification script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6755](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6755). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Only build dynamic libraries (we don't need the static libs to verify, and I got "compiler is out of heap space" errors when I built locally just now, will have to investigate that some more later)
- Maybe some other things

comments.body:
